item.title: DS Capstone Project
item.description: Data Science Specialization - Capstone Project This project is the closing chapter of the JHU / Coursera Data Science specialization MOOC. The Capstone project consisted in building an “intelligent keyboard”, that tried to guess the next word based on what you type. It will also detect any bad language and clean it. I took a slightly different approach to all implementations that I have seen, going for a solution where the datagram database is implemented in SQLLite.
